alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Southern Mountains; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 2:05AM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph through Wednesday morning central and southern mountains. * WHERE...Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs, Central Mountains and Southern Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. Traction laws may be enacted. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility impacting routes such as SR-143 to Brian Head.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
